import data from "../../stays.json"; import locationIcon from "../../assets/img/locationIcon.png"; import { Box } from "@mui/material"; const Search = ({ location, handleLocation, onClickNav, offModal, adultsTotal, childrenTotal, adultsLess, adultsPlus, childrenLess, childrenPlus }) => { const buttonSearch = data.map((element) => element.city + ", " + element.country); const buttonSearchArray = [...new Set(buttonSearch)]; return ( {buttonSearchArray.map((element) => ( onClickNav(element)} value={element} /> ))}
Ages 13 or above
Ages 2-12
); }; export default Search;
